oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to John W. McDonough
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written on U. S. Christian Commission stationery to "Dear Brother" from A. J., J. A., and W. T. Easley. "We went under a flag of truce and I can tell you John it did not look right to see the Jonnys and Yankees all mixed up together Looks like war is over." McDonough served in the 12th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA.
